tasks.task: Farmer participating in an organized farming incubation program.
subtasks: Research and gain knowledge on hydroponic farming techniques.
Practice and implement hydroponic farming in a larger space.
Collaborate with other women in the agricultural sector for mutual support.
Train young women in agribusiness skills including finance and market access.
Develop an online platform to showcase and connect agribusinesses.
Expand farming operations to include multiple value chain components (e.g., poultry, piggery, sheep/goat farming).
Increase community involvement through training programs and partnerships with local organizations.
Utilize digital platforms for education and networking within the agricultural community.
Advocate for effective farming practices through media appearances and awards recognition.

tasks.task: Young women participating in an agribusiness incubation program.
subtasks: Learn practical farming skills through hands-on training and workshops.
Develop personal development and business management skills.
Collaborate with incubation partners to expand market access.
Explore various agricultural value chains beyond traditional crop farming.
Apply学到的技能研发的商业计划，在各自的社区开展低碳农业项目。
Promote community food security through backyard farming initiatives and seed distribution.

tasks.task: Hosting and managing an online agricultural platform.
subtasks: Establish and maintain virtual profiles of farmers, suppliers, and stakeholders.
Facilitate Q&A sessions with agricultural experts for community engagement.
Connect users with agricultural resources, inputs suppliers, and market opportunities.
Grow the platform's global network to span multiple regions and countries.
